title: Melinda Kong, MD San Francisco
cleaned_text: Doctor of Medicine, a common medical school degree for physicians. MDs at One Medical typically specialize in family medicine, internal medicine, geriatrics or pediatrics. About Melinda Melinda is an energetic and caring doctor who practices holistic medicine using both integrative and traditional evidence-based medicine. She's passionate about collaborative care, focusing on prevention through nutrition and less-invasive therapies, pain management utilizing integrative medicine, and reproductive health. She enjoys caring for whole families, families with multicultural backgrounds, and patients coping with chronic mental and physical health conditions. Melinda loves spending time with her family and friends, trail running, traveling to learn about new cultures, yoga retreats in faraway destinations, and qi gong meditation at home. Raised in the East Bay, she earned her medical degree from UCSF in conjunction with a master's of science from the School of Public Health at UC Berkeley. She completed her residency at Contra Costa Regional Medical Center in Martinez, CA. She's board-certified by the American Board of Family Medicine. Other languages spoken: Mandarin, Cantonese Melinda loves spending time with her family and friends, trail running, traveling to learn about new cultures, yoga retreats in faraway destinations, and qi gong meditation at home.
